meanings.definition: To stimulate the production of luteinizing hormone.
meanings.sent1: The doctor luteinizes the body to help make a special hormone.
meanings.sent2: The brain luteinizes to signal the release of important hormones.
meanings.sent3: The chef luteinizes the recipe with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The sun luteinizes the flowers, making them bloom brightly.
meanings.sent5: The music luteinizes the atmosphere, creating a joyful mood.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of luteinization.
meanings.sent1: The egg luteinizes before it can be fertilized.
meanings.sent2: The cells luteinize as part of their natural development.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar luteinizes into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The fruit luteinizes as it ripens on the tree.
meanings.sent5: The seed luteinizes in the soil, preparing to sprout.
